title: Active site switching on high entropy phosphides as bifunctional oxygen electrocatalysts for rechargeable/robust Zn–air battery
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01912A, Paper
Ren He, Shiqi Wang, Linlin Yang, Sharona Horta, Yang Ding, Chong Di, Xuesong Zhang, Ying Xu, Maria Ibáñez, Yingtang Zhou, Stefan Mebs, Holger Dau, Jan Niklas Hausmann, Wenyi Huo, Prashanth W. Menezes, Andreu Cabot
FeCoNiPdWP exhibit excellent oxygen evolution and reduction reaction performance via all elements playing distinctive roles and the switchable active sites in redox reactions, leading to robust zinc air batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
